values: A pine is a type of tall, thin tree with needles instead of leaves.
There were many beautiful pine trees in the forest.
n. [林] 松树；凤梨，菠萝 adj. 松木的；似松的 vt. 为…悲哀；哀悼 vi. 渴望，痛苦；憔悴

- n. 松树
- 松木
- vi. 消瘦，憔悴；痛苦
- 渴望

时 态:  
pined，pining，pines
